product_name: Mountain Hardwear Plasmic Rain Pants - Men's
long_description: Waterproof, breathable and lightweight, the Mountain Hardwear Plasmic pants for men let you hike in comfort in rainy weather. Dry.Q(TM) EVAP 2.5-layer nylon fabric accelerates evaporation for breathability and comfort. Articulated knees aid mobility. Partial elastic waist for comfort; elastic hems with Velcro(R) adjustments. Mountain Hardwear Plasmic pants have 9 in. ankle zips for easy on/off.
short_description: Waterproof, breathable and lightweight, the Mountain Hardwear Plasmic pants for men let you hike in comfort in rainy weather.
